job.title: Software Engineer (Remote to start)
job.description:
At Flylance, we have fun doing what we love by providing superb experience, speed, quality, and cost. We empower our Flylancers to take on challenging assignments and roles with an elevated level of responsibility in our agile working environment. Our people make us who we are, and we provide incredible service and experiences that empower us to think outside the box.
Check us out at www.flylance.com
Our client's amazing Fixed Income Front Office technology team is looking for a software engineer to help build a suite of next-generation, cloud-native applications. In this role, you will engineer and develop new capabilities using modern cloud technologies for use by our Portfolio Managers and Quantitative Analysts.
This is a hands-on, full-stack role, providing opportunities to solve complex business and technical problems. You will be a key contributor throughout the entire product lifecycle, capable of working individually, or in collaboration with others.
You will work with smart, talented people across our business. We will expect you to be agile, show leadership, and think outside the box. In return, weâ€™ll give you challenging work that has an impact, gives opportunities for you to learn and grow, and to do so in a collaborative, supportive environment.
